summary: The gay couple Tobi and Ernie are being visited by Ernie's old friend Uta. What at first looks like an innocent house-call, turns into an insidious attack on the couple's relationship.
cast: Frank Christian Marx|Udo Lutz|Alexandra Starnitzky|Sascia Haj|Marcel Schlutt|Marcus Lachmann|Dominik Djialeu|André Schneider|Luise Schnittert|Ades Zabel|Stefan Kuschner|Marc Bluhm|Carolin Boltz|Nina Queer|Timo Pfaff|Katharina Pütter|Klaus Hoser|Tim Heilmann|Marie Luise Püllhorn|Maurice Ittershagen|Marc Hodapp|Bastian Harting|Kriss Rudolph|Hermann Eppert|Christina Giessmann|Sander Verhagen|Stefanie Lermen|Chelito
title: Männer zum Knutschen
